results.title: Bitcoin Mining Company Griid Secures $525 Million Credit Facility From Blockchain.com

semantic_roles.sentence: On Monday, the mining firm Griid Infrastructure announced the company has secured a $525 million credit facility from the crypto firm Blockchain.com.

semantic_roles.sentence: On Monday, the mining firm Griid Infrastructure announced the company has secured a $525 million credit facility from the crypto firm Blockchain.com.
According to the announcement, the credit facility will be a four-year term in order to increase the company’s mining capacity.

semantic_roles.sentence: On November 22, Griid Infrastructure announced the company has secured a $525 million credit facility from the company Blockchain.com .

semantic_roles.sentence: The financing will be used to increase mining capacity as well as “capitalizing on over 1,300 megawatts of available power from existing energy generation partners.” According to the announcement, Blockchain.com’s Institutional Markets team has crafted some of the largest credit facilities in the market.

"Blockchain.com is an ideal capital partner as we strengthen our infrastructure and operations across our growing portfolio of bitcoin mining facilities," the mining company's CEO added.
